Alternatively, if 'take place' implies a successful completion, then it might be considered FALSE since it didn't finish. But typically, an event taking place doesn't require a successful outcome unless specified. So it's more about whether it was held or not.

So, based on this reasoning, I think the claim is TRUE because the marathon event did take place in 2000, even if the participant didn't complete it.
